channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- LetterPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- LetterPress

item.title: CVE-2024-3590|2024-08-21T20:51:24.611Z -- unknown -- letterpress
item.description: The LetterPress WordPress plugin through 1.2.2 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks, such as delete arbitrary subscribers
